meta.name: description
meta.content: We strive to educate students and to assist them in realizing their full potential as responsible, productive, contributing members of society by providing an educational environment in which students are challenged, excellence is expected and differences are valued.

div.p: Applications are ONLINE ONLY due to COVID-19. *All in-parish students, who were granted transfers in the previous year, are NOT required to renew/reapply.ONLY students living outside of Evangeline Parish are required to renew/reapply. For transfer inquiries, email angelia.arvie@epsb.com.

div.class: custom_143202 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

div.h4: Future Educators of Evangeline Parish Posted Date: 03/09/2020
div.p: On Friday, March 6, 2020, F.E.E.P. Clubs from each high school attended the meeting where they engaged in various activities and received important information from EPSD Supervisory Personnel. . . .
The Work-based Learning Luncheon was held Thursday, March 5, 2020 to show appreciation for the students and businesses that teach the students the skills they need when entering the workforce. . . .

p.font: The Evangeline Parish School Board does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in the admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its program and activities and provides equal access to designated youth groups.

p.a:
Evangeline Parish
School Board
1123 Te Mamou Road
Ville Platte, Louisiana 70586

div.p: Summer Hours: Monday- Thursday, 7:00 am- 4:00 pm

p.font: The Evangeline Parish School Board does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in the admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its program and activities and provides equal access to designated youth groups.
The following persons have been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

Mike Lombas
Evangeline Parish School Board
1123 Te Mamou Rd.
Ville Platte, LA 70586
337-363-1873

font.br:
Kelli Lafleur
Evangeline Parish School Board
607 Harvey LeBas Drive
Ville Platte, LA 70586
337-363-6301
